english.segment1: . I WISH I COULD PAINT YOUR WORLD SO BEAUTIFUL. AND I WISH I COULD MAKE IT RIGHT. BUT OF ALL THE THINGS I COULD EVER WANT FOR YOU. I WISH THIS MORE THAN LIFE
english.segment2: LOVE THE LORD WITH ALL YOUR HEART. WITH ALL YOUR SOUL YOUR MIND AND STRENGTH. LOVE THE LORD WITH ALL YOUR HEART. WITH ALL YOUR SOUL YOUR MIND AND STRENGTH
english.segment3: IF I COULD GIVE YOU BACK YOUR INNOCENCE. AND IF I COULD TURN BACK TIME. IF I COULD HEAL YOU OF ALL THE BROKEN PROMISES. STILL THE GREATEST THING IN LIFE
english.segment4: IS LOVE THE LORD WITH ALL YOUR HEART. WITH ALL YOUR SOUL YOUR MIND AND STRENGTH. LOVE THE LORD WITH ALL YOUR HEART. WITH ALL YOUR SOUL YOUR MIND AND STRENGTH
english.segment5: LOVE THE LORD WITH ALL YOUR HEART. WITH ALL YOUR SOUL YOUR MIND AND STRENGTH. LOVE THE LORD WITH ALL YOUR HEART. WITH ALL YOUR SOUL YOUR MIND AND STRENGTH
english.segment6: YOUR HEART AND SOUL YOUR MIND AND STRENGTH. YOUR HEART AND SOUL YOUR MIND AND STRENGTH
